SEARCH
Package fr.foxelia.parity.shop

Class ShopManager

java.lang.Object
fr.foxelia.parity.shop.ShopManager
public class ShopManager extends Object
This class is used to manage all the shops. It contains all the shops and the signs that are linked to a shop. It also contains the GUIs that are used to edit or use the shop. It also listen ShopEditorListeners to manage the GUIs editor and SignListeners to manage the signs.
Since:
release 1.0.0
Version:
1.0
Author:
Zarinoow

  • Constructor Details

    • ShopManager

      public ShopManager(Main main)
      Constructor of the ShopManager. Only run one instance of this class.
      Parameters:
      main - The main class of the plugin.
      Since:
      release 1.0.0

  • Method Details

    • saveShops

      public void saveShops()
      Save all shops in a file. This method is called when the server is stopping. You can safely call this method to save the shops data.
      Since:
      release 1.0.0

    • addShop

      public void addShop(Shop shop)
      This method is used to add a Shop to the list of the currents shops. If the Shop is already in the list, it will not be added.
      Parameters:
      shop - The Shop to add.
      Since:
      release 1.0.0

    • deleteShop

      public void deleteShop(Shop shop)
      This method is used to remove a Shop from the list of the currents shops. If the Shop is not in the list, it will not be removed. If the Shop is linked to a sign, the sign link will be removed too.
      Parameters:
      shop - The Shop to remove.
      Since:
      release 1.0.0

    • addSignShop

      public void addSignShop(org.bukkit.Location location, Shop shop)
      This method is used to create a Shop linked to a sign. If the Shop not already exist, it will be created
      Parameters:
      location - The Location of the sign.
      shop - The Shop to link to the sign.
      Since:
      release 1.0.0

    • removeSignShop

      public void removeSignShop(org.bukkit.Location location)
      This method is used to unlink a Shop from a sign. If the Shop is not linked to the sign, nothing will be done. The Shop will not be deleted.
      Parameters:
      location - The location of the sign.
      Since:
      release 1.0.0

    • removeAllSignShop

      public void removeAllSignShop(Shop shop)
      This method is used to delete all Location linked to a Shop.
      Parameters:
      shop - The Shop to unlink. If the Shop is not linked to any Location, nothing will be done. The Shop will not be deleted.
      Since:
      release 1.0.0

    • isShopLocatedAt

      public boolean isShopLocatedAt(org.bukkit.Location location)
      This method is used to check if a Shop is linked to the provided Location.
      Parameters:
      location - The Location of the possible Shop.
      Returns:
      True if a Shop is linked to the block located here. False otherwise.
      Since:
      release 1.0.0

    • isAlreadyLinked

      public boolean isAlreadyLinked(Shop shop)
      This method is used to check if the shop has already a linked block.
      Parameters:
      shop - The Shop to check.
      Returns:
      True if the shop has a linked block. False otherwise.
      Since:
      release 1.0.0

    • getShopOf

      public List<Shop> getShopOf(UUID player)
      This method is used to get a List<Shop> of all the shop of a player.
      Parameters:
      player - The player UUID to get the shops.
      Returns:
      A List<Shop> of all the shop of the player.
      Since:
      release 1.0.0

    • getShopOf

      Parameters:
      player - The OfflinePlayer or Player to get the shops.
      Returns:
      A List<Shop> of all the shop of the player.
      Since:

      Returns:
      A List<Shop> of all the shop of the city.

    • getShopLocatedAt

      public Shop getShopLocatedAt(org.bukkit.Location location)
      This method is used to get the Shop linked to the provided location.
      Parameters:
      location - The Location of the shop.
      Returns:
      The Shop linked to the Location. Null if no shop is linked to the Location.
      Since:
      release 1.0.0

    • getAllSignShops

      public List<Pair<org.bukkit.Location,Shop>> getAllSignShops()
      This method is used to get a List of all sign linked to a shop. Duplicate entries are excluded.
      Returns:
      A List containing a Pair of the Location of the sign and the Shop linked to the sign.
      Since:
      release 1.0.0

    • getAllSignOfShop

      public List<org.bukkit.Location> getAllSignOfShop(Shop shop)
      This method is used to get a List of all sign linked to a shop. Duplicate entries are excluded.
      Parameters:
      shop - The Shop to get the signs.
      Returns:
      A List containing all Location where the shop is linked to a sign.
      Since:
      release 1.0.0

    • getAllShops

      public List<Shop> getAllShops()
      This method is used to get a List of all the shops.
      Returns:
      A List containing all the shops.
      Since:
      release 1.0.0

      public Shop getShopById(long id)

      Parameters:
      id - The id of the Shop.
      Returns:
      The Shop with the provided id. Null if no Shop has the provided id.
      Since:
